content: this legal text summarizes a court decision regarding a property dispute the court ruled that the property in question cannot be divided and ordered its sale the property consists of three units located on different streets the plaintiff sought the dissolution of the community property which was received through a gift and testamentary succession the court found that the properties were indivisible and ordered their sale with the proceeds to be divided among the coowners the defendant made a counterclaim but failed to provide evidence and it was dismissed the court also ordered the plaintiff to repay a certain amount to the defendant for unjust enrichment the court costs were awarded to the defendant the court heard the attorneys of the parties involved and made a final decision the decision was made on april 9 2015 and filed with the clerks office on october 4 2015
